snippet.title: MIDNIGHT RESISTANCE (AMIGA - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Midnight Resistance (un-emulated) for the Amiga A500, a true classic from the golden era of amiga gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1990

Actually quite an enjoyable game to play, many levels and baddies to get through, love the "pick a weapon" interval" but never really knew what all the bonus pods you can pick up in this stage actually do, some of them don't seem to do anything, still a good game though.
This is 1 of just 3 games i had to use the "improve video" icon as the game has a very dull picture, this is the programmers problem as it's the same on a normal tv, the other 2 with the same dull problem is Dragon Spirit and After The War.
I have used the infinite credits cheat so i could upload the entire game for your viewing pleasure.
P.s: sorry for the corrupt end screen, it's a cracked copy but you're not missing much trust me, just a single pic.

Hope all you Amiga fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
